definition: Campbell (name)/Kampar, town in the state of Perak, Malaysia
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: As the new semester starts, i adapted the mood of soldiers going for war to Kampar…
sentences.chinese: 新的學期開始了，我帶着兵士出征的心情前往金寶。

sentences.english: At a battle scene, Chien-Po found General Li's helmet.
sentences.chinese: 在地上，金寶發現了李將軍的頭盔。

to reveal outstanding talent (idiom); to stand out as conspicuously brilliant

a galaxy of talent (idiom)/a great number of competent people
